questions:
Q1. Which test is specifically mentioned for diagnosing Typhoid in the provided text?
a) Blood pressure test
b) Widal test
c) Alveoli fluid test
d) Genetic test

Q2. According to the text, what is the definition of health?
a) The absence of any disease or illness.
b) A state of mental, social, and physical being.
c) A condition where organs and organ systems are disturbed.
d) Only the physical well-being of an individual.

Q1. Which of the following are considered essential whorls of a flower?
a) Calyx and Corolla
b) Androecium and Gynoecium
c) Sepals and Petals
d) Stamens and Petals

Q2. In which adaptation for self-pollination do bisexual flowers never open throughout their lives?
a) Monocliny
b) Homogamy
c) Cleistogamy
d) Dichogamy
